articles.title: Pfizer's Covid vaccine may not work as well if you're fat - Daily Mail
articles.description: The Italian study indicated the jabs trigger a much weaker immune response in those who are severely overweight after two doses. But experts said the 50 per cent looked 'suspiciously high'.
articles.content:
